text: The mother of an autistic teenager who became'promiscuous and self - destructive'after a failed X Factor audition says going on the talent show was'the worst thing she could have done '. The celebrity - obsessed teenager was so embarrassed after her audition that she dropped out of college, slept with a'deluge'of men and embarked on a lesbian relationship with a Syrian hoaxer. Her behaviour led social workers to fear that she was not capable of making decisions for herself, and her case ended up being heard in front of a judge at a Court of Protection hearing in Newcastle upon Tyne.
